title: How to Sew Lock Stitch

steps.headline: Work from the base of the curtain to the top.
Fold back the lining or interlining.
steps.description: Stitch through both the lining/interlining and the main fabric.

steps.headline: Pick up only a couple of threads with each stitch.
Make the next stitch about 2 inches/5cm along the lining/interlining.
steps.description: At all times keep the stitching slack.

steps.headline: Continue in this manner all of the way from the base of the fabric to the top.
Tie off and knot the end.
steps.description: Cut to remove the remaining thread length. Done.
